parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: ID of the WAF ruleset, which can be obtained by calling the [ListWafRulesets](~~2878359~~) interface.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) interface.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The target status to change for the ruleset.
